issue.title: [R] Consider autoconverting SF cols to binary when saving
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14380](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14380). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is similar to what [sfarrow](https://github.com/wcjochem/sfarrow) does and could be compatible with [geopandas](https://geopandas.org/)
